problem_text_cn: 如图,在边长为2的正方形内部,以各边为直径画四个半圆,则图中阴影部分的面积是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, inside the square with edge length N_0, draw four semicircles with each side as the diameter, then the area of ​​the shaded part in the figure is ()
raw_answer: 解:如图所示,S_{阴影}=S~△AOB~=\frac{1}{4}S~正方形~=\frac{1}{4}×2×2=1．故选:D．
raw_comment: 本题考查的是扇形面积的计算,根据题意作出辅助线是解答此题的关键．
